TopicTitle: How to make rotating parts? Like propeller engines

Articles.Content:
(First of all I don't know if this is the right forum but I hope so)

I know firespitter/KAX exists but how do they actually work (I'm too much of a C# noob so I can't really look at the source, even though that helps a bit)? I assume they change texture to a blurred one once the engine revs up, but before that, how do the parts rotate?

 Would like to make something similar but with a passenger jet engine so the fan blades start spinning, is that possible?

Really appreciate all answers! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Firespitter comes with some of the best documentation you're ever going to get: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1iD52DfHft04Hb48TEhF5a4n5JOc8efUevdg5Y_QPICQ/edit](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1iD52DfHft04Hb48TEhF5a4n5JOc8efUevdg5Y_QPICQ/edit)

Should get you started.
